{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the provided information, we can rule out options D (Chronic abscess) since there is no pain or swelling, and pulp is vital. Options C (Radicular cyst) and A (Periapical granuloma) are also unlikely as they would typically cause symptoms such as pain, swelling, or pulp necrosis.
